text: Reza Pahlavi (; born 31 October 1960) is the oldest son of Iranian Mohammad Reza Pahlavi and his wife Farah Diba. Until the Iranian Revolution in 1979, he was the crown prince and the last heir apparent to the throne of the Imperial State of Iran. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian princes and princesses Category:People from Tehran
title: Reza Pahlavi, Crown Prince of Iran
